thread.section_title: Stewart Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 21st and 50th
thread.title_full: 21st and 50th - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chloe S
title: 21st and 50th
text: I visited New York for my 21st and my Mum's 50th, the hotel is a brilliant location right across from Madison square gardens and only 10 minutes from Times square! Staff were very helpful and friendly always saying hello to us. We ate breakfast once in the hotel which was lovely, the bar area is also lovely for a nice drink after being out exploring the city. Our room was quite small, however for the amount of time we were spending in it it was acceptable. As we were there for special birthdays, we returned to our room one night to a bottle of champagne and a birthday cake, a nice surprise!
